definition: to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to die/to shoot dead/to reject/to fall forward/(suffix) to death

sentences.english: Compassion rose up in my heart when I saw the beggar drop dead in the street.
sentences.chinese: 當我看到這個乞丐倒斃街頭時，憐憫之心油然而生。

sentences.english: The bullet went through his head, and he fell dead on the spot.
sentences.chinese: 子彈穿過他的腦袋，他當場倒斃。

sentences.english: The victim was found lying dead on the river bank.
sentences.chinese: 發現被害人倒斃於河岸。

sentences.english: Hit on the head, the enemy officer dropped dead instantly.
sentences.chinese: 那個敵軍官因頭部中彈當即倒斃。
